.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_data_plot_4_data_quality.py:


Data Quality Check
=====================================

Data quality analysis result using the BikeSharing dataset as example.

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 10-11

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 11-18

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.data.outlier_detection import PCA, CBLOF

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="BikeSharing", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["yr", "mnth", "temp"], silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-20

Data quality check for score distribution plot 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 20-22

.. code-block:: default

    exp.data_quality_check(method=PCA(), show='score_distribution', threshold=0.999, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_001.png
   :alt: Score Distribution (PCA)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-24

Data quality check for score distribution plot 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 24-26

.. code-block:: default

    exp.data_quality_check(method=PCA(), show='marginal_outlier_distribution', threshold=0.999, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_002.png
   :alt: Outliers distribution (PCA)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-28

Feature selections using distance correlation strategy 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-30

.. code-block:: default

    exp.data_quality_check(method=[PCA(), CBLOF()], show='tsne_comparison', threshold=[0.999, 0.999], figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_003.png
   :alt: t-SNE projection
   :srcset: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_003.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img


.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

    The default value of `n_init` will change from 10 to 'auto' in 1.4. Set the value of `n_init` explicitly to suppress the warning




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 31-32

Select a method and threshold and apply the outlier removal  

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 32-34

.. code-block:: default

    exp.data_quality_check(method=CBLOF(), show='score_distribution', threshold=0.999, remove_outliers=True, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_004.png
   :alt: Score Distribution (CBLOF)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/data/images/sphx_glr_plot_4_data_quality_004.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img


.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

    The default value of `n_init` will change from 10 to 'auto' in 1.4. Set the value of `n_init` explicitly to suppress the warning




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 35-36

Finally, config the target feature, and train test split, base on the cleaned data.  

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 36-37

.. code-block:: default

    exp.data_prepare(target="cnt", task_type="regression", silent=True)
